text: @DonaldJTrumpJr Saved lives? Sow division? We're watching different pressers. Daddy turned down to visit plant where workers have worked, slept, & ate for 28 days b/c he doesn't wear a mask, virus in WH & owners worried he would bring it in. Impressive! @townhallcom  https://t.co/lfJG1t8oWn
